name: V!RUS
description:
Your computer has become riddled with viruses! Aim your Anti-Virus cannons at the viruses with the mouse, and click to fire. But look out! Those anti-virus beams are strong, so keep your mouse away from them or it'll be GAME OVER. 100 points are gained for each virus eliminated but be fast fast, your score is constantly going down.


Made in about 2 hours for a game jam.
